comment: I would give 10 stars. It had been so hard for me to switch app to app because my phone take tons of amount of time to launch each app. If I open one app and another one would take time to open when I reopen it. I am studying and only have one phone to do search with a browser, kindle, email, hand an type writing and constantly switching apps. This app switches apps like MIRACLE 😇This is saving me lots of time(and my stress level stay healthy as well)

reply.author: Geeks Empire
reply.content:
Thanks for Rating and Review
Please, Don't forget to Share it

comment: Pretty good.  I like have each one individually floating along with a toolbox. Looks good.  Right now I have a row of small transparent across the top.  My 2 suggestions are to be able to lock them into position and keep the x on them longer for delete

author: A Google User
comment: It is nice... works.. Okay... 😕😕😕 but it needs some improvements !!! A non- technical user wont be satisfied !!! I suggest you make it easier to use if you want some more users... for me it is okay... but others like my family members and older generations would get lost !!!    Update: I have given it 5 stars for the great support team and for the great app features and I hope it gets better and that it gets more users soon !!! 😅😅😅 it is a nice idea... ☺☺☺

reply.author: Geeks Empire
reply.content:
Thanks for Rating & Review.
Well, Thanks for Opinion & Will Work to Make it more Easy-to-Use.
Also Please Email me If there is something more to make improvement.
- GeeksEmpire

title: excellent

comment: Shortcut and activity launch will be highly appreciated :) swiping would be awesome in that case moving van be achieved by holding and dragging. Assigning separate actions for swiping gives extra functionality.

title: Idea deserves more than 5 stars

author: Simon Carter
comment: But the implementation is a little flaky. Can the shortcuts toggle off when Bluetooth or GPS switches off? And although I choose large for shortcut size they're still quite small. Lots of potential!
title: Nice to see my idea implemented...

author: Eugene Ratney
comment: Icons are easily drag able. Has a tendency to drop off but otherwise works better then other floating apps.
title: Works really smoothly

author: Adam Valentine Nguyen
comment: Great idea! There were bugs with transparent icons + way to move those!  1. When i activate "Auto Transparent", come back to the list of apps, check some more apps to be floated... The icons appeared overlapped.  2. When i tried to move those, there were many icons of the same apps were created!  3. It wasn't possible to remove those! The app got freezed!  It will be extremly helpful, if user can create not only icons for Apps but also... floating shortcuts for ACTIVITIES!!! I hope u will have this in your development plan!

reply.author: Geeks Empire
reply.content:
Thanks for Rating & Review
Bug Found & Fixed, Please Wait for Update.
+ I will add option for users to choose between Activities & Apps
- GeeksEmpire

author: Bob T.
comment: Needs persistence (task manager kills it.)  And selection lists desperately need to display sorted by name!  (not seemingly random as they are now)  I don't have the patience to find "out of order" entries.

reply.author: Geeks Empire
reply.content:
Thanks for Rating & Review
Use Steady Mode

title: Could be (will be?) great!

author: Tee Isme
comment: Without persistent notification, shortcut is eventually killed off by system (or as soon as recent apps are cleared). Will check back, re-install & change rating once persistence is implemented.

reply.author: Geeks Empire
reply.content:
Thanks for Rating & Review
All Activities & Services will shut down when u remove main scope (remove app from recent list)

title: Good app w/ one major flaw

author: Rio Wong
comment: Just freezed and crashed. Never worked

reply.author: Geeks Empire
reply.content:
Thanks for Rating & Review.
Please​ use 'Send Report' option to report crashes.
It uses System to open other Apps. I will try to find a different way to make this process faster​.
PLEASE  Update to Latest Version: .33_ALPHA
- GeeksEmpire
